Job Description  As one of Allstate's next generation innovation initiatives, we are creating a team to lead an ambitious project to create value at the confluence financial services, big data and analytics and digital customer experiences. The team is responsible for defining the strategy, building solutions, managing the product portfolio and building end user applications in new and emerging domains. We are carving out entirely new class of solutions that are driven by insights derived by data analytics in our business lines and related user experiences. These solutions are geared towards both B2B customers as well as consumers in our ecosystem. We are looking for deep thinkers, researchers, smart software engineers and gritty product owners to join our team.  In this role we are seeking for a Lead Big Data Engineer with data analytics background that can lead the creation of a complex data lake. The role will support the identification, selection and standardization of the data based products and services.
